about_the_game:
This is the prologue for Foxblade.

Foxblade is an Action-RPG where you forge your strengths through battle, as a lone hero you complete quests, find powerful random weapons and artifacts to boost your powers.

Key Features


  • Choose between three main playstyles
Do you like to be in the frontlines where the glory lies? Then Melee combat is for you.
Do you prefer flank your enemies from the distance and strike them to the ground before they can even reach you? Then Ranged combat is your choice.
or do you prefer invoke the fury of the arcane magic, and smite, shock and burn your enemies with incredible spells? Then your choice lies with Magic combat.



  • Quick and responsive action combat

Attack quickly and master the dodge mechanic to become nearly untouchable. Help yourself with abilities you learn when leveling up.

  • Special abilities

Level up your weapon of choice and learn special abilities depending on the weapon you use and crush your enemies.



  • Item Sets

Each item has a specific main color, if all the items you have equipped have the same color you get a bonus depending on the weapon type you have equipped.

  • Randomized Locations

Each location has a fixed size, but the location of the dungeon entrances, teleporters, quest items and environment assets have randomized locations making every game slightly different.

  • Randomized loot

There are 4 types of quality in items:
Common, Uncommon, Rare and Unique.
Each one superior to the previous one, and the Unique weapons has special lore behind them that can be read in the item description.
Each item spawn with a slightly randomized stats making them one of a kind.

  • Main and Optional Quests

Help the inhabitants of this strange land, befriend them, get awesome rewards for a job well done and earn your place in this world.
